title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.3 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.3 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part or its application to any
person or circumstance is held invalid, the remainder of this Part and the
application of those provisions to persons or circumstances, other than those
to which it is held invalid, will not be affected thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
382.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
